In England, in the seven days to 28 December, there were 783,221 new confirmed cases (1,385.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 21 December, there were 618,980 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 27% (164,241 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 January is 11,272,332 (19,933.3 cases per 100,000 population).
